Message:
It was tough being
as good as I was,

and it didn’t take long before
I proved to be the most
adept witch in the village.

Driven by my growing curiousity,
I, the inquisitive Gil’uial,
left the village without
even a second thought.

Unlike now, there were no
Curses to hinder my travels.

Hence, I enjoyed the sights of
so many countries out there.

But at the same time,
questions began springing
into my mind.

The world is so vast,
yet why must we witches
stay hidden in secret?

We possess special powers,
yet why must we keep
feeling ashamed about them?
